intro: Helianthemum glabellum, commonly known as the smooth rockrose, is a low-growing shrub native to the Mediterranean region. It features small, yellow flowers that bloom in late spring to early summer. The plant has small, leathery leaves that are typically covered in a fine, powdery coating. It thrives in well-drained soils and is often found in rocky or sandy habitats. Helianthemum glabellum is drought-tolerant and is often used in xeriscaping due to its hardy nature.
